Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2008 10:29PM Heathersmom wrote: Hi, I too would like to get some insight on this chemo thing. I get my first treatment on Thursday Dec.4. I must admit I am scared. The changes (with more to come) that this has brought about are almost overwhelming. Is there anyone out there that can offer some words of encouragement, advise, and tell me if it will be possible to work full time at a desk job? I have very little sick time leave due to just starting the job a year ago.

very worried found large lump momto4kids Lisa1962

Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2010 01:09AM - edited Feb 21, 2010 01:12AM by Heathersmom Hi, It is important you do something very soon, either get in to a dr. whether you get set up with a family doctor right away or see your ob/gyn or go get a mammo. The important thing is to get the lump checked out as soon as possible. I  had a mammo, ultrasound, MRI, then biopsy. Good Luck to you and let us know how your doing.
